item.title: :dotfiles
item.description: !! Warning, this only works on ubuntu/debain distributions. It has been tested on ubuntu 20.04 only! !! Other people can inspect and manually copy the elements of the files! Installing You will need make Clone into your $HOME directory or ~ git clone https://github.com/sdatth/dotfiles.git $HOME/ # OR git clone https://gitlab.com/sdatth/dotfiles.git $HOME/ Run the make command to get my configuration cd dotfiles make install Compile alacritty from scratch # this just follows all the steps from the official repo "https://github.
